biography.bio: Gwénaël Sommier is an actor, known for T'choupi (2004), Kirikou et les bêtes sauvages (2005) and Brother Bear 2 (2006).
biography.name: Gwénaël Sommier

biography.bio: Clovis Mahouden is an actor, known for T'choupi (2004), T'choupi et ses amis: La cabane des copains (2010) and TChoupi et ses amis - 1, 2, 3 soleil! (2010).
biography.name: Clovis Mahouden

biography.bio: Héloïse Jadoul is an actress, known for La religieuse (2013), T'choupi (2004) and T'choupi et ses amis: La cabane des copains (2010).
biography.name: Héloïse Jadoul

biography.bio: Nicole was born and raised in New Orleans, LA. She booked her first acting job at age 15-a commercial for Easy Spirit Shoes. Nicole graduated from Destrehan High School and then attended the University of New Orleans as a Drama/Communications major. While studying at UNO, she began working behind the scenes in TV/movie production. Nicole has worked on countless movies, TV shows, commercials and music videos as a production assistant, director's assistant and personal assistant. During her time in production, Nicole had the opportunity to assist and work with some top names in the entertainment industry including Academy Award Winning cinematographer Robert Richardson, who shot films such as JFK, A Few Good Men, Casino, The Aviator and Kill Bill Volumes 1 & 2 and world-renowned, eccentric music personality and producer, Kim Fowley, who is best known for discovering Joan Jett and The Runaways and also for co-writing songs with rock legends KISS and many other artists. In 2000, Nicole moved to Los Angeles, CA where she was offered a prestigious job working as a personal assistant and nanny to Academy Award Winners Angelina Jolie-Pitt and Brad Pitt and their family. Her work with the Jolie-Pitts enabled her to travel around the world and offered many unforgettable and invaluable life experiences. The Jolie-Pitts were gracious and inspiring employers. During her down-time working for the Jolie-Pitts in Los Angeles, Nicole was also able to take acting classes in Los Angeles where she studied for several years with Steve Helgoth who was trained under the esteemed and legendary New York actress and teacher, Uta Hagen. Nicole credits Steve with molding her into the actress she is today. In 2007, Nicole decided to switch gears and focus entirely on her acting career back home in New Orleans, where her heart was. In addition to acting, Nicole has found a passion for teaching acting as well. She teaches at Launch Model and Talent Academy in Metairie, LA and is available for private coaching and audition coaching.
biography.name: Nicole Barré

biography.bio: Pépino Cappotonoi is an actor, known for T'choupi (2004).
biography.name: Pépino Cappotonoi

biography.bio: Jean-Luc François is a director and actor, known for Les mystérieuses cités d'or (2012), T'choupi (2004) and T'choupi et Doudou (2000).
biography.name: Jean-Luc François

biography.bio: Damien Gillard was born in 1972 in Belgium. He is an actor, known for Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014), The Wall (1998) and T'choupi (2004). He is married to Maria Del Rio. They have two children.
biography.name: Damien Gillard

biography.bio: Pascal Gruselle is an actor, known for Hemoglobin (1997), Déjà vu (2008) and Marche à l'ombre (1984).
biography.name: Pascal Gruselle

biography.bio: Nathalie Hugo is an actress, known for Kérity, la maison des contes (2009), De Club van Sinterklaas & De Verdwenen Schoentjes (2015) and T'choupi (2004).
biography.name: Nathalie Hugo

biography.bio: Jean-Paul Landresse is an actor, known for Le pantalon (1997), T'choupi (2004) and Les hommes et les femmes sont faits pour vivre heureux... mais pas ensemble (1995).
biography.name: Jean-Paul Landresse

biography.bio: Jean-Louis Leclercq is an actor, known for Potiche (2010), Children of Love (2002) and Petit homme (2005).
biography.name: Jean-Louis Leclercq

biography.bio: Julie Mauclert is an actress, known for T'choupi (2004).
biography.name: Julie Mauclert

biography.bio: Marie-Jeanne Nyl is known for her work on Pentimento (1989), T'choupi (2004) and The Black Flower (1997).
biography.name: Marie-Jeanne Nyl

biography.bio: Philippe Résimont is an actor, known for La mer à l'aube (2011), A Wonderful Love (1999) and Alléluia (2014).
biography.name: Philippe Résimont

biography.bio: Pascale Salkin is an actress, known for The Gang of Four (1989), Paris vu par... 20 ans après (1984) and Golden Eighties (1986).
biography.name: Pascale Salkin
